sub_title: Teammanager Private Sector Development 1  bij Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland (RVO)/Netherlands Enterprise Agency

company.name: Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland (RVO)/Netherlands Enterprise Agency

profile_positions.description:
My team and I are responsible for the PSD toolkit. The objective of the PSD Toolkit is to strengthen the local private sector -if possible with Dutch knowledge- and to increase the impact of Dutch PSD programmes and interventions by PSD partners. The PSD Toolkit can be applied (in the 70 countries 
 on the PSD country list) to contribute to local capacity building while at the same time supporting Dutch organisations and entrepreneurs in their development-related economic activities.
All embassies and representatives in these countries have their own PSD coach who can assist them with the use of the PSD Toolkit and with an integrated approach on Private Sector Development.
profile_positions.title: Teammanager Private Sector Development 1

profile_positions.description:
As Private Sector Development (PSD) Coach I aim to support the Netherlands representation in Tanzania and Ghana in their efforts to remove trade barriers, create a business-enabling environment and in matching local and Dutch business partners. 
For this, I am working  closely together with the different PSD instruments within RVO and with other PSD partners such as Nuffic and CBI in order to achieve synergy in our interventions to promote private sector development.
Also I develop interventions (so called PSD Apps) which contribute to local capacity building  and at the same time support Dutch organizations and entrepreneurs in doing business. Typical examples of interventions are Government-to-Government cooperation (G2G), International cooperation between knowledge institutions (K2K), matchmaking (missions)  for local entrepreneurs.



Former positions within RVO.nl:
-Development and monitoring of international cooperation projects (Government-to-Government / G2G) with Chinese government organizations. The G2G programme aims to contribute to an improved business climate and enhanced opportunities for trade and investment for both countries. Moreover, in 2011 a large number of projects were designed to contributed to environmental protection.

-Developing and monitoring G2G projects in pre-accession countries such as Macedonia, Bulgaria and Romania. Project themes included :police cooperation, public finance, land ownership, environmental protection, health and horticulture.  

-Netherlands Constituency Support Facility. Coordination and development of public finance related projects in (WB/IMF) Constituency Countries.
profile_positions.title: PSD Coach Tanzania, Ghana, Sierra Leone and Liberia

profile_positions.description:
Public-private partnership development aimed at strengthening the international position of clusters of companies, within the framework of the program "Partners for International Business". 
Industry focus: Horticulture and propagation material. Currently most active in China.
http://www.rvo.nl/subsidies-regelingen/partners-international-business-pib
profile_positions.title: Program Manager Partners for International Business
